headline: Record EV Sales Drive Auto Market Ahead of Credit End
summary: Automakers are holding prices steady despite tariffs shaving $12 billion and counting from their bottom lines.

raw.headline: Record EV Sales Drive Auto Market Ahead of Credit End
raw.summary: Automakers are holding prices steady despite tariffs shaving $12 billion and counting from their bottom lines.

headline: While auto sales charged higher in August, a murky fall outlook weighs on automakers
summary: Automakers like Toyota, Ford, Kia, and Hyundai saw sales rev higher in August as consumers shook off tariff effects for now and dove into EVs before tax credits expire. But the outlook for the industry heading into the fall is murky, with loss of incentives, high interest rates, and a gloomy economic landscape weighing on the market.

raw.headline: While auto sales charged higher in August, a murky fall outlook weighs on automakers
raw.summary: Automakers like Toyota, Ford, Kia, and Hyundai saw sales rev higher in August as consumers shook off tariff effects for now and dove into EVs before tax credits expire. But the outlook for the industry heading into the fall is murky, with loss of incentives, high interest rates, and a gloomy economic landscape weighing on the market.

headline: Lucid Joins Forces with Academy Award Nominees Timothée Chalamet and Director James Mangold in Exhilarating New Brand Story
summary: Lucid Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: LCID) maker of the world's most advanced electric vehicles, debuted its latest creative campaign, "Driven," with an adrenaline-fueled new brand story featuring award-winning actor Timothée Chalamet. Directed by renowned filmmaker James Mangold of Minted Content, and also featuring the stunt team from Mangold's 2019 Ford v Ferrari blockbuster, the story showcases the unrivaled capabilities of the all-electric Lucid Gravity.

headline: Ford transforms its racing division to bring track technology to your driveway
summary: The new Ford Racing organization, formed Sept. 4, will encompass road and race cars, customer experiences, merchandising and global activities.

raw.headline: Ford transforms its racing division to bring track technology to your driveway
raw.summary: The new Ford Racing organization, formed Sept. 4, will encompass road and race cars, customer experiences, merchandising and global activities.

headline: Ford recalls 499K crossovers for rear brakes hoses that could rupture
summary: The Ford Edge and Lincoln MKX models were previously recalled in April 2021 for front brake hose leaks.

raw.headline: Ford recalls 499K crossovers for rear brakes hoses that could rupture
raw.summary: The Ford Edge and Lincoln MKX models were previously recalled in April 2021 for front brake hose leaks.

headline: China's BYD cuts sales target, sources say, as white-hot growth cools
summary: China's largest automaker told analysts in March it was targeting sales of 5.5 million vehicles for 2025.  The target remains subject to change depending on market conditions, the people added.  BYD's Hong Kong-traded shares, which were down 1.4% before the Reuters report, extended losses and were down 3.1% in the afternoon.
